caption.p: IFITM3 deletion reduced the number of activated GC B cells in spleens after TIV immunization. (a) Lymphocytes were isolated from splenocytes from each group of mice. The populations of CD3 -B220 +FAS +GL7 hi cells were defined as GC B cells and analyzed by flow cytometric analysis. (b) The percentage of GC B cells among B220 + B cells were compared between WT and Ifitm3 -/- mice at days 0, 3, 7, 14 and 28 after booster immunization ( n = 5 per group). Significant differences are marked by * P < 0.05, ** P < 0.01, *** P < 0.001.
